titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate regarding the Medicare national coverage determination on the treatment of anemia in cancer patients.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance.
Senate Committee on Finance discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 9/4/2007--Passed Senate without amendment. Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services should: (1) begin an immediate reconsideration of the final National Coverage Determination on the Use of Erythropoiesis Stimulating Agents in Cancer and Related Neoplastic Conditions (CAG-000383N); (2) consult with members of the clinical oncology community to determine appropriate revisions to it: and (3) implement such revisions as soon as feasible, and brief Congress in advance of announcing such changes.
